title: Walmart | SWE-3(IN3) | BLR | Accepted
content:
Education: MCA from Tier-1
Years of Experience: 3.5
Prior Experience: SDE 2 at Fincorp
Compensation: 22.5 LPA (All fixed)


Company: Walmart
Title/Level: Software Engineer 3 (IN3)
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: ₹27,13,000 (including retirals)
Stock Bonus: 25% of salary every year, vested equally over 3 years
Bonus: 20% of salary
Joining Bonus: ₹2L
First-Year Compensation: ~₹36.5L

P.S. :- Had 1 competing offer have negotiated once with the recruiter. She matched first year comp. by adding JB

title: Amazon | SDE-2 | Chennai
content:
* Education: B.Tech in Computer Science
* Years of Experience: 2.8 YOE
* Prior Experience: Software Engineer at Product based MNC
* Date of the Offer: March 2025
* Company: Amazon
* Title/Level: L5, SDE-2
* Location: Chennai, India
* Salary: 45 LPA
* Signing Bonus: 18 lakhs for first year, 14 lakhs for second year
* Stock bonus: 200 units vested in 4 years (5%, 15%, 40%, 40%)
* Relocation Bonus: 1.5 lakhs
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 66.5 LPA for first year
* Benefits: Standard Amazon benefits
* Other details: Didn't negotiate, accepted the offer.
